00048 /**
00049  * @brief Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.
00050  */

00052 
00053 public:
00054 
00055   /**
00056    * Constructor.
00057    * @param probeSets - Vector of probesets to compute metric on
00058    */

00060                               QCProbesetOptions& psOpts,
00061                               ChipLayout* layout,
00062                               const std::string& label = "D_score");

00075    */
00076 
00077   void newMultiChannelChip(int celIx); //index of metaCelFileNames
00078

00080    * calculate the summary stats for a given probeset

00084    * @param channel - purely for logging purposes report the channel
00085    */
00086   void calcStats(vector<ProbeListPacked>& probeSets,

00092    * calculate the summary stats for a given probeset
00093    * @param cel - Filehandle to open cel file
00094    * @param probeSets - list of probelist
00095    * @param chipStats1 - cumulative stats object to compute statistics - v_score
00096    * @param chipStats2 - cumulative stats object to compute statistics2 - cv_score
00097    * @param channel - purely for logging purposes report the channel
00098    */
00099   void calcStats(vector<ProbeListPacked>& probeSets,
00100                  affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData* cel,
00101                  CumulativeStats<double>& chipStats1,
00102                  CumulativeStats<double>& chipStats2,
00103                  int channel);

00106   /**
00107    * Get the names for the pair of cel files that have been seen.
00108    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00109    */
00110   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() {
00111     return m_CelNames;
00112   }
